text: - My name is Judith.

I'm Principal Account Manager
at AWS in Enterprise Retail,
and I'm based in Munich.
In my role, being an account manager,

it helps to be interested in
the goals of our customers,

how can we help them and
how can we work together
to make that happen?

I think it's also important to
to know about current trends

in IT and also the
industry you're working in,

and then think of how AWS
can help the customers

with the current challenges
or industry trends.

I do have an IT background
that helps working for AWS,

but you don't have to
have an IT background

if you're interested in
innovative topics and technology,

and willing to learn, and
then you can learn everything.
It never gets boring at AWS,

because our customers
have changing challenges,
portfolio areas changes almost every day.
Every day is exciting (laughs)
(quiet upbeat music)
